name: Hamre Bras
description:
Arcade style prototype from 2013-14.
Two Hammer Bras duke it out, throwing hammers at each other.

As you play, both players earn new hammers that they can slot into their attack cycle.

Controls:


KeyboardMouseXbox Controller
MovementW/A/S/DMouse Movement
Left Stick
AttackSHIFTLeft Mouse Button
XJumpSpace Bar
Right Mouse Button
ASelect Top Upgrade
Arrow Key Up
Forward Mouse Button
YSelect Bottom Upgrade
Arrow Key DownBack Mouse ButtonB

Credits:
Kasper Urban Kajgaard
Jon Aschberg

Music:
Ceephax - Flight of the Condor
